thread.title: Packages With Possible Explosive Sent to Washington Defense, Intelligence Sites

author: Del Quentin Wilber
title: Packages With Possible Explosive Sent to Washington Defense, Intelligence Sites
text:
A half-dozen defense and intelligence installations in the Washington area received packages Monday containing rudimentary devices that had what appeared to be components of an explosive, a law enforcement official said.
Several of the packages contained rambling letters, the official said. No one was injured and investigators werenâ€™t sure whether the devices were capable of exploding, U.S. officials said. The packages drew a response from bomb squads.
